akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7462. International cybersecurity technical standards(a) In generalThe Director, in coordination with appropriate Federal authorities, shall—(1) as appropriate, ensure coordination of Federal agencies engaged in the development of international technical standards related to information system security; and
(2) not later than 1 year after December 18, 2014, develop and transmit to Congress a plan for ensuring such Federal agency coordination.
(b) Consultation with the private sectorIn carrying out the activities specified in subsection (a)(1), the Director shall ensure consultation with appropriate private sector stakeholders.
(Pub. L. 113–274, title V, § 502, Dec. 18, 2014, 128 Stat. 2986.)

(b) Consultation with the private sector In carrying out the activities specified in subsection (a)(1), the Director shall ensure consultation with appropriate private sector stakeholders.
